thread.title_full: Tourism Toronto celebrates Canada Day in a special wayTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Tourism Toronto celebrates Canada Day in a special wayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Tourism Toronto celebrates Canada Day in a special way Published on : Wednesday, July 15, 2015
On the joyful occasion of Canada Day (1st July), Tourism Toronto presented a delectable jar of cookies to various MICE sellers in India. This was done in order to celebrate the day as well as thank leading travel agents, Hotel & Airline partners for their contribution in growing Toronto as a leading MICE destination for Indians.
The Tourism Toronto India Team lead by Ms. Sudarshana Kar met over 80 personals from different organizations such as Thomas Cook, SOTC, Cutting Edge, Platinum World, Inorbit Tours, Starwood Hotels & Resorts, Hilton Hotels, Corporate flyers and many more.
Speaking on the occasion, Ms. Sudarshana Kar, Business Development Manager, MICE, Tourism Toronto, said, “At Tourism Toronto, we are always looking for ways to show gratitude to the industry. Recently we announced an incentive program for the Indian market so that MICE sellers can benefit by working with us. Canada Day celebration is another initiative that gives us a chance to personally meet each one and thank them for their continued support. ”
